translations: 使……当学徒；当学徒（apprentice 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I was apprenticed to a plumber when I was fourteen.
sentences.translation: 我14岁时给一个管子工做学徒。

sentences.sentence: When he grew older, William Smith taught himself surveying from books he bought with his small savings, and at the age of eighteen he was apprenticed to a surveyor of the local parish.
sentences.translation: 当威廉·史密斯长大一些，他用自己的一点积蓄买了一些书，自学测量学，并且他18岁时在当地教区做了一名测量师的学徒。

sentences.sentence: His father apprenticed him to a barber.
sentences.translation: 他父亲送他去当理发师的徒弟。
